item.description:
Our adventure into the apple orchards of Honeypot Farm. What a beautiful backroads ride to Stow, MA. Apples and apple cider donuts!

http://www.honeypothi...

Don't forget flags for your bikes...It is 9/11 !!!!

Meeting Location : Dunkin Donuts -1395 N Main st
Exit 5A off Rt 128/93 in strip mall on left across from Comfort Inn
Randolph

Meeting time : 8:30 am (arrive earlier if you need more time to eat and have coffee)

Riders Meeting 8:45 am

Ride leaves: 9 am

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA
